E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 2/2/1993
Subject: Contract offer
You have to be kidding me with your offer.
Offer more money or I will not even think about it.

Regards,
Kevin Gross

So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Mike Dunne

Date: Monday, 5/1/1993
Subject: Status of Lance Painter
Dear Sir,
Lance Painter seems overmatched at AA Tulsa Drillers!
He has an ERA of 6.94 over there, so I think
you should demote him.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1993
Subject: Status of John Wehner
Dear Sir,
John Wehner isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Tulsa Drillers!
He has an AVG of .187, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director

He has an AVG of .286, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

should demote him before he gets burned.
